title: X-mas Moments and Traditions, Kevin Hart, Miss Ann, Joy Behar, Joe Biden, Robert Mueller, Workaholic, Dr. Roni, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: X-mas Moments and Traditions, Kevin Hart, Miss Ann, Joy Behar, Joe Biden, Robert Mueller, Workaholic, Dr. Roni, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Happy Humpday! Uncle Steve shares his favorite memories of Christmas with us. Kevin Hart will be hosting the 91st Academy Awards in February. Joy Behar and Meghan McCain have a heated exchange of words. Joe Biden believes that he is the most qualified person to be President. Robert Mueller recommends no prison time for Flynn. Is it possible to have a relationship with a workaholic? New York Times bestseller author Dr. Roni DeLuz stops by the show. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about the importance of valuing yourself plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
